prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The project aims to revolutionize software development by enabling the creation of programs in plain human language, making them understandable and executable by both humans and machines. This shift is driven by advancements in large language models like GPT and Claude.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
